channel.title: "No response from loginserver"; "Please try again in 5 seconds
channel.description:
I continue to get this error or "Please try again."
"No response from loginserver"; "Please try again in 5 seconds.
Can any one please explain to me why this is happening? Thanks!
*EDIT*
I know it works correctly because it can connect to a different server, but not the creativescape server.

item.title: "No response from loginserver"; "Please try again in 5 seconds
item.description:
@360236 wrote:

There is no errors and when you click login it gives that little message. Weirdly the server receives no connection what so ever. But I have connected to a different source with the same client. So It has to be the server?

Read full topic
item.source: "No response from loginserver"; "Please try again in 5 seconds
